info.name: Dwiseguy
info.description:
StartFragment

## ðŸ“˜ Dwiseguy Backend API Documentation

Welcome to the **Dwiseguy Backend API Documentation**.

This document provides a comprehensive guide to all available API endpoints, including request structures, response formats, authentication requirements, and example usages to help developers integrate quickly and efficiently.

The API follows **RESTful standards** and uses **JSON** for data exchange, ensuring consistency, scalability, and ease of use across different platforms.

EndFragment

Domain : [https://dwiseguy-backend.onrender.com](https://dwiseguy-backend.onrender.com)

BAse url: /api/v1

Full url: [https://dwiseguy-backend.onrender.com/api/v1/](https://dwiseguy-backend.onrender.com/api/v1/)
